text: 16.7 Sng 19.9, Lep 13.10, 15.3, 16.14, 19.2 Anɨb agek, takaw olap God nop sɨbogep abañ adek ak nɨb agak, Nad God Bɨawl yɨbɨl, tap okok mɨdupsek gɨnɨmɨn tek nep mɨdeb ak agak. Binɨb anɨb okok kɨlop bɨlokɨl nɨŋɨd yul ñɨban ak, gɨpal tek nɨŋɨd pen abe gɨpan agak. Yɨpɨd gɨl adek ak nep gɨpan agak.
